abstract: Displayed data should be obscured to protect private information.
overview:
## Discussion

Views marked with `privacySensitive` will be automatically redacted using a standard styling. To apply a custom treatment the redaction reason can be read out of the environment.

items.description: Displayed data should appear as invalidated and pending a new update.
items.name: invalidated

items.description: Displayed data should appear as generic placeholders.
items.name: placeholder

title: privacy
